EX-TRX, our prototype magic bot, requires a continuous supply of energy to operate. And don't you want to see it work?

Bring me crystals from {@LinkCreature:34#1010#icereaver giants} in Frost Reach.

And don't look at me like that! During the design phase, crystals from icereavers seemed like a perfectly plausible energy source.

Enough crystals to keep the bot running for the day! That's great, but I'll need your help again tomorrow.

EX-TRX is nothing if not greedy for power! Hmmm. Let's pretend that didn't sound ominous.

To keep this machine running, I need a supply of energy. Crystals from icereaver giants, specifically.

It's fusion science. You wouldn't understand.
